predict_diagnosis:
1. X-linked chronic granulomatous disease (X-CGD)
2. Chronic idiopathic neutropenia (CIN)
3. Myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS)
4. Chronic myelomonocytic leukemia (CMML)
5. Acute myeloid leukemia (AML)
6. Diamond-Blackfan anemia (DBA)
7. Chronic hypoplastic anemia (CHA)
8. Thalassemia major
9. Glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase (G6PD) deficiency
10. Familial platelet disorder (FPD)

Please provide a detailed explanation for each diagnosis, including the underlying genetic mutations, clinical features, and laboratory findings that support each diagnosis.
